website_summaries.verdict: Not only is this powder good for your skin, but you can get your money back if you don't like it. A good choice for anyone who wants a versatile body powder.
pros: Unisex powder is suitable for anyone to use
Doesn't contain talc, and is made with natural ingredients including plant botanicals and minerals
Soothing to the skin and great at reducing moisture
cons: Container is fairly small considering the price
Not everyone likes the unique scent

customer_reviews.title: This product works, but there is a learning curve.
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely works as advertised. I like the aroma, but I don’t go around sniffing my crotch. I don’t see why you couldn’t use this as a body powder or, under arms as well. You must shower daily without exception to avoid sweating the next day, and causing a bigger problem. This must be washed off daily. The only other drawback is it is a bit messy as some will get on the floors, and some remains on your hands if you use to much. Overall though it works, and for me that is all that matters. I have a hand broom; just learn the proper ratio you personally need, and you’ll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Aschecte

customer_reviews.title: Helpful product for men.
customer_reviews.text: This is great on all kinds of nuts. When you get older, it seems you start to get moist everywhere and your junk just sticks to your leg causing you to have to adjust constantly. You start looking like a hip hop dance crew member-hey, maybe they need this powder? This powder and a good powder puff will cure your junk stickiness and make your gooch dry as a desert all day. Great name for a product that caught my eye. This is good stuff for men that doesn't smell like a baby's backside. Deserving of a five star, nothing to gripe about!
customer_reviews.author: Hoghead

customer_reviews.title: No bs PURE essential oils and no talc
customer_reviews.text: Real deal, ONLY essential oil no artificial fragrance. Very woody. I am a lady who tends towards more "masculine" scents so this is great. I shy away from a lot of powders due to their false advertising for "essential oil" fragrances. Many will Say "no artificial fragrance" and the product ends up smelling like Loves Baby Fresh. Blech. This is true all essential oil no bs and NO TALC! GOod stuff for men or women. One minus is the plastic container but I am a anti plastic freak but a cardboard container would be way classier !
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Espen

customer_reviews.title: Scent is peculiar ( NOT in a good way! )
customer_reviews.text: I happen to REALLY like the smell of cedar , but don't want my Husband smelling like a cedar closet! I am not allergic to scents, perfumes etc. and not one of "those" people who claim to be "sensitive" to smells . This stuff had an unpleasant, peculiar smell that combined in a kind of "nasty" way with the too strong smell of cedar . I tried to imagine what people would think when my Husband got close to them at work ? That I had my Husbands clothes in a cedar chest? Ugh! How embarrassing .Glad I just bought the sample size!!!!
customer_reviews.author: CHINATOUCHE1

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. After trying anti-fungal lotions to control jock itch, which never worked well, I switched to Fromonda. Great stuff. Keeps me dry and cool. Contrary to other reviews, it does help control jock itch in my experience. The scent is somewhat strong but not unpleasant and once the powder is applied, it's not noticeable. Ab it pricey? Maybe but this small bottle lasted...well, a long time. The stuff goes a long way unless your dusting your whole body in it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan & Jen Nevada

customer_reviews.title: Awesome body powder
customer_reviews.text: Great body powder with an awesome scent. Scent lasts for quite a while as well and keeps everything nice and dry. I wanted to switch from a talcum based product and found Fromonda here and figured i would try them out. Can't go wrong here as it is a good product. Only downside is amount for the price. The name brand powder i was using before was almost double in size and a few dollars less. However, not being talcum based and having such nice scents i don't mind paying a little extra for that.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't find anything good about this
customer_reviews.text: Cons: > Smells horrible > Does not last all day > Expensive > Primary ingredient is a starch (not arrowroot) which encourages fungal growth
customer_reviews.author: WebNik

customer_reviews.title: Money wasted. Smells like urine.Literally.
customer_reviews.text: Smells like urine. The scent is disturbing and I’m throwing it out. I used the unscented and liked it. I figured I’d take the opportunity to get a woody smell but this is wretched. Money wasted. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: 5STAR

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This review is for armpits. I was skeptical that it would work, especially at this price point. It was advertised as working on armpit odor so I gave it a try. I put it on at 8:30AM and smelled my pit sweat by 10:30AM. One of the fastest return decisions I ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: The fact this product is natural without harming them is fantastic. And Fromonda uses essential oils which is something ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my brothers. They were very impressed by not just the smell but by how it works. My one brother is a fireman who has to wear heavy gear and layers. It gets very hot under the fireman gear. The fact this product is natural without harming them is fantastic. And Fromonda uses essential oils which is something I use on a daily basis in my skin care or in a diffuser. Thank you Fromonda for being a product that is healthy and useful!
customer_reviews.author: RNICOLE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Due to recent scares about baby powder and women’s health I’ve been looking for a talc free option this powder is fantastic and is not overpowering only sent i due to recent scares about baby powder and women’s health I’ve been looking for a talc free option this powder is fantastic and is not overpoweringly scented. Its lightand soothing goodfor any and everyone
customer_reviews.author: AfternoonNapper

customer_reviews.title: This was not my favorite powder. The product Balla is much better
customer_reviews.text: This was not my favorite powder. The product Balla is much better. It costs more but the texture is much smoother and it smells better. I suppose the adage of you get what you pay for is true. I will not be purchasing this particular product again.
customer_reviews.author: TVanTaylor

customer_reviews.title: Smells great - not sure I'd buy more
customer_reviews.text: I love anything with an Earthy scent. This product is nicely packaged and presented. They even claim to donate some money towards prostate cancer research. I like the fineness of the powder, as well, probably due to the arrow root ingredient. For such a small bottle, however, it is very expensive. I ended up just looking up how to make my own scented powder to save money in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Fortier

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff! It has a spicy/woodsy (hence the name) ...
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff! It has a spicy/woodsy (hence the name) smell that is not overpowering but adequate. I use it as a natural deodorant alternative. Lasts for around four hours keeping moisture and body odor in check when used under arms. The natural ingredients and masculine smell makes for a clean feel.
customer_reviews.author: Android

customer_reviews.title: Great powder
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Fromonda for around two years. A 5oz three pack lasts me about 6 months. I tried most of the other scents but Woody is by far my favorite and now the only one that I use. I wish it was a little bit cheaper but I haven't found anything else that compares to this so far. It sounds weird but I have had some compliments about how good I smell after I take a shower and walk out in my underwear - they are literally complimenting me on how good my package smells.
customer_reviews.author: VTNC

customer_reviews.title: Best Dry Shampoo Ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I use it as dry shampoo and I can go five days without washing my hair and it still feels fresh. I have thin, fine blonde hair that gets greasy really fast and this has really helped. I love the scent as well. Highly recommend as a dry shampoo!
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: No Floral!
customer_reviews.text: It has a nice texture and keeps one dry. The scent is definitely "woodier" that other marketed toward men. However, I think of a "woody" smell as having a rounder finish. This has a slight sharpness to the scent's finish...almost (but not really close to) citrus. I would give it a 5 if it ended with a down note rather than an up note.
customer_reviews.author: James Turner

customer_reviews.title: Just not Balla
customer_reviews.text: Gave it a try however it doesn't measure up to Balla Body Powder. I am female and was going for the fine textured talc and the very light oak/musk scent fragrance. While Amazon no longer offers the original Balla powder, I found it at Target at about half the price !!
customer_reviews.author: McLean-ite

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best smelling and most comfortable powder that I have used. I have tried MANY others but always seem to return to Fromonda Woody. The scent is clean, manly, and fresh and it does not clump or become sticky. Don't give it another thought...buy this powder and keep a spare as they sometimes sell out on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Are you sweaty?
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered multiple times. In Texas, it is hot and humid and this stuff works. Nice scent and no talc and lasts long. If you are tired of feeling sweaty, smelling like a monkey or a baby, this is the stuff. This and the CITRUS IPA are my two favorites from Fromonda.
customer_reviews.author: PCP777

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Works!
customer_reviews.text: After numerous 12hr shifts in Texas heat, I can definitely say this keeps your junk if not 100% dry, at least chafe free and not leaving you to wonder why your car seat smells like sweaty b***sall the way home. I've tried a lot of powders between the Army and Civie life, but this is the first that actually leaves me with NO unpleasant scent whatsoever after a hard day. Impressed. Product scent very similar to opening an unfinished Cedarwood box.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Unique...
customer_reviews.text: Unique fragrance.... Kinda smells like something you’d soak your clothes in before going deer hunting. Not what I was expecting but not horrible. Will be great for backwoods hiking and camping.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkie0104

customer_reviews.title: incredible product
customer_reviews.text: The scent is light and good for men or women. My husband wears his work boots 14 hours at a time so keeping his feet dry and healthy is challenging. This is the first product that has worked, keeps them dry and they no longer smell, even after 14 plus hours. He'll be using it on his southern regions come summer so I'm glad that it doesn't have talc or other nasties. Oh, he loves the scent.
customer_reviews.author: weezydog

customer_reviews.title: Contains cornstarch
customer_reviews.text: I didn't read the ingredients. I usually do but didn't this time. I don't usually like cornstarch. I give it three stars, it does its job. The smell is wonderful from the essential oils. If you don't mind cornstarch, I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: I like having 3 containers
customer_reviews.text: I like having 3 containers: 1 for each bathroom and 1 for my gym bag. I am a woman and the scent is nice but a little too "woody" for me to actually love. It smells like fresh pine sawdust.
customer_reviews.author: DB Rose

customer_reviews.title: Terrific cedar smell!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if I would like this, but the instant I tried it, it was love at first smell. Awesome cedar smell. Doesn't smell like fragrance, smells like natural wood. Very good at keeping me dry. Wonderful product, I can highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: blueLEDs

customer_reviews.title: I’m a convert to the Woody Body Powder
customer_reviews.text: Let me put this a delicately as possible - I’ve been using the Woody powder for about a month and my stuff has never smelled better. It’s not that the powder is strongly scented, but rather it’s some kinda magic because at the end of the day, post workout, or whatever, I just smell clean. I’m a total convert.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rice

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. I am a woman but I love woodsy/earthy type scents. This definitely lived up to it's name. The smell is perfect. Something I would wear that could harmonize with my usual perfumes. The bottle is small...smaller than I anticipated but what I noticed is that it's not as "light" and powdery as other uh um "lady" powders so I end up using and wasting less. Be forewarned though, if you want to use it down under...be prepared for a tingle from the tea tree!!
customer_reviews.author: LVT2DVM21

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Great solution for a problem more men should be tending to. Only con imo is that it's a tad less absorbent then I'd imagined. A quite copious amount is needed to ensure thorough dryness throughout the region. Depending on your showering habits, product may need to be administered either twice a day or after every shower. I will be buying the larger size next time.
customer_reviews.author: Josh R.

customer_reviews.title: No fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Had absolutely no smell after I put it on, not what I wanted. I’ll look elsewhere...
customer_reviews.author: J. Creasy

customer_reviews.title: Go lightly -- it's just sample size
customer_reviews.text: Wow, 1.4 oz is NOT a lot. This size would be best described as "tester" rather than travel size. That being said, the scent is nice and woody, with the cedar top note quite distinctive. I like it -- just wish there were more of it.
customer_reviews.author: Emrys M

customer_reviews.title: Works better than big name brands.
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using it for about a week, but I really like it. Smells great, very masculine - BUT the fragrance is subtle once the powder is applied, unlike some brands that have a lasting perfume or medicine odor. Very fine powder, not gritty like cheap talc, and does it's job without clumping up. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great powder, do not like smell
customer_reviews.text: The powder is nice, very fine, keeps all parts dry. The smell is too much. To me, it smells like lemon cleaner. Not a smell I want on my body.
customer_reviews.author: SoylentGreene

customer_reviews.title: Nice woodsy aroma but not overpowering at all
customer_reviews.text: Denser than normal powder, so less in the air and on the floor when you put it on. Nice woodsy aroma but not overpowering at all. You can smell a faint cedar wood aroma and feel a bit of the cool tea tree oil when you put it on. It's not just for men either. :)
customer_reviews.author: R. A. River of Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Smells great but pricy
customer_reviews.text: I decided to give this a try despite the price. While it smells it great it works just the same as other powders
customer_reviews.author: J. Joyner

customer_reviews.title: Love the product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, the feel of it, the natural fragrance, clearly no chemicals or weird additives. It's a little pricey though there are pricier. I think it may be a new addition to my body line up in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Lovelace

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I did a lot of research to find the most effective product that did not contain harmful chemicals for men. This product definitely keeps my dry and the fragrance is very masculine without being over-powering. I’ve bought this multiple times and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: After over one month of use, I rate this as a five-star product. The fragrance is minimal, which is good since I'm outdoors much of the time and don't want to advertise myself to insects... Unlike the powder I used to use, this one doesn't surround you in a "cloud" when you're applying it. It's a good substitute for a shower when you're running late after a gym workout.
customer_reviews.author: TN Grub

customer_reviews.title: No Joke. Just try it.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely satisfied with this product! Amazed at how well is works AND keeps you smelling great. Definitely solves swamp issues.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: pamper yourself!
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff - pricier than the after shower ones at the grocery store but smells great and doesn't fly all over the place when shaken out. Figure I'm worth it especially if compared to what my wife spends on toiletries!!
customer_reviews.author: MichaelO

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: magnificent, better than the dude-powder in every way, especially scent.
customer_reviews.author: Abraxas

customer_reviews.title: costs too much
customer_reviews.text: This has a great smell , works on keeping you dry but costs too much for what it is .
customer_reviews.author: GA

customer_reviews.title: Best Talc-Free power I've tried!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other talc-free powders, but none of them had all day staying power until now. This stuff works! I use a little bit after a shower and I'm good all day long. It's absorbent and smells good too. I'd recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: kaiseristhereason

customer_reviews.title: this will keep all your parts dry!
customer_reviews.text: it is a wonderful powder! the smell is not real strong, so that may be good or bad for you. i have lost weight recently and have some overhang that tends to stay moist. this has been a miracle. give it a try! it beat a baby powder hands down!
customer_reviews.author: wsm

customer_reviews.title: Great clean cedar smell!
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of cedar, so I'm not surprised I love this powder. In winter or summer, there are just some bits on you that don't get enough ventilation, but I was sick of smelling like baby powder - not to mention I'm trying to avoid talc. This stuff perfectly suits my needs. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Here in NoPo

customer_reviews.title: Dry and Natural
customer_reviews.text: ☆UPDATE☆ After using only 3 times it actually caused a nasty rash, which has taken 2 weeks to clear up. Two stars because i did like the smell. Nice and dry on hot humid summer days with all natural ingredients. Smells great too, nice and masculine.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Ameche

customer_reviews.title: Guys, your junk will thanks you!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Absorbs perfectly, smells great, easy to use. My suggestion would be to stand in the tub when applying.
customer_reviews.author: Thom D.

customer_reviews.title: Great cedar smell.
customer_reviews.text: Great cedar smell. Doesn't float all over the bathroom... ordered an additional 3 pack.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Freaking awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love the powder,the scent and the fact that I can work 10 hours in a warehouse, no AC, sweating and still feel fresh and smell great with this powder. I've been using powder as a replacement for modern deodorant and *natural* deodorants. I've had many compliments and inquiries on what I use. Definitely have a lifetime customer
customer_reviews.author: Britty

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Can’t wear conventional deodorant even the all natural stuff without breaking out. Was using Gold Bond powder prior to discovering Fromonda powder. The scent is great and last all day additionally the powder doesn’t get all over and make the same mess that store powders make. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Darin M.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and would buy again if you got more for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Palermo

customer_reviews.title: Smells really good!
customer_reviews.text: The aroma is light but fragrant without being obnoxious. Powder feels silky and absorbs moisture very well.
customer_reviews.author: glam giver

customer_reviews.title: Good for the body
customer_reviews.text: Bought these some time ago but had to try it out to determine if I liked it. It is a great smelling product and while it is talc-free it still acts like a talc. It absorbs moisture. I use it on body parts after a shower.
customer_reviews.author: Leod Mann

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Like that it is non talc. The scent is nice. Last a long time frame. Would suggest doing a sandalwood scent.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Gartrell

customer_reviews.title: Works like it should but no baby smell
customer_reviews.text: Great smell not to strong... for a man should be great and not over power colognes... using for about week and half works like a charm so far.. and no talc in it makes me feel better.
customer_reviews.author: REC

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I used this body powder for the first time this morning. I can tell already that I am going to be a repeat customer. The Woody fragrance has a nice subtle cedar scent and the powder feels softer/silkier than traditional talc. It is also less expensive than another powder I am a fan of, Baala. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: TLCohen

customer_reviews.title: Nice woodsy smell
customer_reviews.text: Has a nice woodsy smell. I bought it for my disabled son and helps him smell really nice and keeps his skin dry.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: All great except one thing...
customer_reviews.text: I like that this product smells great, is organic, is vegan, is talc free, absorbs moisture, and keeps everything cool! What I don’t like is that my wife does not enjoy the taste (which is the nicest way I can put this) so I am reluctant to use it unless I know I’m going to shower.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely LOVES this product. He had tried just about everything with no success. The smell is nice and the powder doesn't make things worse after it get moist (😝) down there.
customer_reviews.author: LACEY BUNKER

customer_reviews.title: When I use this, there's no smell "Fromonda"...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as I was going to New Orleans for business and didn't want to get "swamp butt". Much finer than baby powder and smells great.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work for me. I was using under my breast to help with sweat. It caused irritation to my skin, burning sensation and even caused me to peel. The powder doesn't go on smooth and leaves a lumpy residue. Within an hour, I would have to reapply. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Salvador

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is nice smelling very fine powder with a manly scent of cedarwood! I use it on hot days for a refresher to my colognes! Also works to keep feet smelling nice. This is NOT and antifungal and does nothing for jock itch but it is worth having on hand at the gym or whenever you need to feel a little fresh and smell nice!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher W.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this stuff & others offered positive comments. Fragrance level is just right.
customer_reviews.author: UTC1966

customer_reviews.title: Great scent and performs well
customer_reviews.text: Great scent (didn’t care for the Citrus IPA) and were well throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Reading is Life

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, but I wouldn’t say it kept me dry ...
customer_reviews.text: Smells good, but I wouldn’t say it kept me dry more than a few minutes. Then again, I do sweat like some sort of apocalyptic rain god.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob A. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: shocked at the size
customer_reviews.text: sorry i spent what i did for this, it was 7 dollars for a hotel shampoo size bottle, do not recommend anyone buy this
customer_reviews.author: Richard P.

customer_reviews.title: NOT TALC
customer_reviews.text: I am a barber and I love to use this product! With the new scare with talc, this lets my clients know that I am aware and doing what is best for them. They appreciate the effort. The smell is great too!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Louise

customer_reviews.title: First review
customer_reviews.text: At first I was unsure of this off market brand. But since using it I have not been disappointed. I bought only one but will need to buy more. It lasts all day gets the job done. Scent is not obnoxious or overpowering. I recommend giving it a shot is affordable and a great buy compared to other brands
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have for Men
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for eliminating odors down there, especially if you're active. The Cedarwood & Tea Tree Scent is smooth, plus the thing that makes this certain product great is that this powder is natural ! I definitely recommend this to all my fellas out there!
customer_reviews.author: Zach Curtis

customer_reviews.title: So fresh and so clean
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. Tried the Atonemint variety and it doesn't hold up thru a full day for me. This one keeps me fresh. 😊
customer_reviews.author: MDamian

customer_reviews.title: I like this product because I was searching for an alternative ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because I was searching for an alternative to ultra-expensive silky underwear from lush and talc-containing baby powders. The smell is pretty nice, but I will say that if you are a woman or have kinda funky junk, do not anticipate any intimate times with your partner and/or do not smell your own dirty underwear when searching through your laundry for a clean pair. It makes you smell like the best dressed fillet of salmon when combined with human odors. By itself, it's good. I use it for my hair as a dry shampoo and to prevent chub rub when I know I won't mind smelling like a dinner special.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Works fine .
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work just fine . I dont smell a sent . And the price point is high.
customer_reviews.author: Corey S

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!! SUPER FAST DELIVERY
customer_reviews.text: First, let me say that I usually never leave a review. This product and service was so good that I had to. It smells nice and is not over the top. I've used it twice now. Once for a hardcore gym day and once for a normal day and it worked well both times. Then there is shipping. It got here in like two or three days! Very pleased and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pricey
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell and works good, just a little pricey
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin P.

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing, natural, takes care of swamp-butt!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a natural talc free powder for my husband and found this on Amazon, it smells wonderful and it seems to be working on keeping the boys dry.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: No more baby powder!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for men. Really like this much better than smelling like baby powder after my shower.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on it does not make a mess ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on it does not make a mess and go everywhere. It has been real humid here and it has really helped a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Blade

customer_reviews.title: I glad to have this
customer_reviews.text: I use talc for my kitchen rubber gloves to keep them dry. I glad to have this. I use much less than regular talc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was on the look-out for a body powder that didn't smell like a baby or a perfume counter
customer_reviews.text: As a guy, I was on the look-out for a body powder that didn't smell like a baby or a perfume counter. A friend suggested this and I'm already a big fan. The smell is nice and woodsy - very subtle.
customer_reviews.author: C. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this powder as a talc-free alternative for my fiancée. Although initially reluctant to try a new brand, he loves it and even just bought more for himself! Excellent product and tentative customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten Reif

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for about a week now and it works great. I have sensitive skin so a lot of things make me rash up but this works perfect with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: C. Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for my dad
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as part of a gift for my father since he loves masculine scented powders and I wanted him to have a safe talc free powder.
customer_reviews.author: Pretty-Smart-Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for nomads
customer_reviews.text: Small so it fits anywhere. Pat some on the places that "the sun don't shine" and I stay fresher for longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dad loves it after his showers. Clean and fresh smell.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Fellow

customer_reviews.title: Amazing scent, excellent powder!
customer_reviews.text: This powder has an amazing scent, I love it...so much so that I’ll be ordering the body wash too. Just a plus that it’s talc free.
customer_reviews.author: sharon Reeder

customer_reviews.title: Manly smelling body powder will keep dry and odor free all day.
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised ! Smells fresh and manly. Not flowery but woodsy. Kept my " parts " dry and comfy all day.
customer_reviews.author: blueridgeboy

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't in impressed
customer_reviews.text: Just wasn't impressed with the smell in my own opinion
customer_reviews.author: Jason K Mathews

customer_reviews.title: ... as part of a themed Valentine's Day gift for fun, but he actually loves the smell and enjoys ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband as part of a themed Valentine's Day gift for fun, but he actually loves the smell and enjoys that it's talc free. It's definitely woodsy, but not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Way to small.EMBARISING.
customer_reviews.text: I guess I over looked at product, just ordered it I've seen bigger sampler Products. I should be offered another bottle . I
customer_reviews.author: scott iszler

customer_reviews.title: Good for you and your boys
customer_reviews.text: I STAY stocked with this stuff Best man pow I’ve found ever
customer_reviews.author: Chef Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Smells pretty good too!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the places you sweat in and didn't know were there!
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine

customer_reviews.title: Best smelling powder ever!
customer_reviews.text: This powder has become my go-to wonder product. The smell is amazing- clean, crisp and masculine. I not only use it as you would a typical body powder, but is also great in the hair as a like dry shampoo, taking away any oily, dull looking hair- and makes your hair smell great. Customer service is the best!
customer_reviews.author: JJ Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product!!!! It really works well. I wouldn't use anything else because this smells fantastic!!!! Love it, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, keeps the 'ol undercarriage clean and dry
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would give this powder a try based on the good reviews. I have not been disappointed. The smell is a nice, but not overpowering, woodsy/spice kinda forrest themed aroma. Seems to perform quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas McCann

customer_reviews.title: scent very potent
customer_reviews.text: scent stronger than I'd hoped.. will update as to how it works
customer_reviews.author: P.J. Bates

customer_reviews.title: It's great and I will not use anything else
customer_reviews.text: Wish that I would have found this powder an number of years ago. It's great and I will not use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Fr. Michael M. Camara

customer_reviews.title: You deserve this.
customer_reviews.text: Earthy cedar aroma with a tough hold against moisture! I’ll never use anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Betty Crocker balls
customer_reviews.text: This is junk. It is such a small amount, application is a nightmare. Has my bathroom floor looking like a Scarface movie. And you have to use so much to be “dry” by the end of the day it looks like betty Crocker cake batter. The smell is weird also. I wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Nice scented powder for men without the concerns of using Talc
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my husband when I was unable to find talc-free powder locally that didn't smell like a baby or a field of flowers. This has a really nice woodsy scent which dissipates so it isn't overpowering. Both of us approve.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad!
customer_reviews.text: Appropriately named. How were you able to actually bottle and market that smell?
customer_reviews.author: aly

product_meta.title: Fromonda (Woody) Body Powder Cedarwood & Tea Tree (5 oz, 1-Pack) Unisex, Talc-Free, Anti-Chaffing, Sweat Defense with Essential Oils
feature_bullets: SWEAT PROTECTION - Whether you’re a man or woman, our talc-free body powder is the answer to all your down under hygiene woes. Our moisture-wicking formulation is designed to keep your sensitive areas cool, dry and smelling fresh for the whole day.
TALC-FREE - Fromonda powders provide a safe, hygienic alternative to talc. They consist of arrowroot powder, baking soda, cassava and kaolin clay.

HIGH QUALITY - Our carefully selected blend of minerals, botanicals and essential oils benefit the skin and hair while also providing aromatherapy benefits. Our Woody scent features an Masculine & Cypress scent
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - we will gladly refund your purchase if you are not 100% satisfied
FROMONDA CARES - At Fromonda, your health is our No. 1 priority. We vow to donate 10% of our profits to the Sean Kimerling Testicular Cancer Foundation.
